news.title: Happiness
news.body: Whoever is happy will make others happy too
news.author: Anne Frank

news.title: Learn
news.body: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn
news.author: Benjamin Franklin

news.title: Rising
news.body: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall
news.author: Nelson Mandela
